law.text: It is the legislative policy that every Kentucky citizen exert the maximum local effort to enforce the livestock, poultry, and fish disease control programs in KRS 257.010 to KRS 257.470 and provide protection to the citizens and livestock, poultry, and fish of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 17, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 244, sec. 1.
